issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch KitchenSink
2. Run Controls > TextField > The Rest
3. Type something into the text field
4. Click on "Clear on Edit"
5. Click into the text field

Actual Result:
Text is not cleared, gets cleared when you hit done

Expected Result:
Clear the text when edit is invoked

Tested on:
Nexus S 2.3.2 Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (Apr 12 2011 15:24 rcc9dd9e1)

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Setting "Clear on Edit" clears the text when the user completes typing instead of when edit is invoked

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
